name: Business Data Analyst
description:
Position

We are looking for a Business Data Analyst who will be responsible for identifying solutions to business problems and assisting with the implementation of the appropriate solution. Responsibilities include value creation through data discovery, envisioning data-enabled strategies, enabling all forms of business insights and outcomes through analytics with the goal to make data work for our clients by any means.

A successful candidate must be a self-driven individual with excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, able to quickly comprehend and adapt to emerging priorities, thrive in a fast-paced, high-performing environment partnering with various teams in the organization.

Key responsibilities

  • Translate complex business ideas into clear technical requirements
  • Gather, document, and designs data integration and visualization requirements for analytical projects
  • Develop and maintain documentation on processes and data sets
  • Interface with engineers from other systems and applications to ensure proper data collection
  • Build repeatable processes, data pipelines, and analytics assets to effectively communicate business insights to empower data-driven decision-making capabilities
  • Improve and advise on data normalization between various data sources
  • Contribute to key and strategic initiatives, not limiting to data analysis, but exploring further on industry best practices and data architecture, driving innovative ideas and data research
  • Leverage general business experience with knowledge to convert high-level business objectives into functional and technical requirements, user stories, and specifications
  • Leverage extensive data and database knowledge and experience to assist others with the data content by providing comprehensive data documentation, data restrictions or limitations, and proper data usage
  • Identify potential solutions for business challenges, assess feasibility, and make recommendations based on the overall analysis.
  • Evaluate data sources and business rules to identify potential impact on data products

Qualifications/Experience

  • 2+ years of data and business analysis
  • Written and spoken English (Upper-Intermediate level)
  • Experience in building end-to-end data views supported by appropriate documentation
  • Experience using modern BI and visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, Qlik, etc)
  • Proven experience in designing, building, and maintaining data processing systems
  • High responsibility, ability to work stably and effectively under pressure and in uncertainty
  • Passion to learn new skills, explore new tools and technologies
  • Critical thinking and intellectual curiosity
  • A team player with a commitment to overall team success
  • Effective communication through multiple media: presentations, dashboards, spreadsheets, and other

Nice to have

  • Programming skills in Python/R with a focus on data analysis
  • Experience in client communications
  • Hands-on experience in modern data processing stack and architectures

Benefits

  • Smartest people in the industry and the most interesting product on Belarusian market
  • Competitive salary
  • Opportunity to work remotely (on the territory of the Republic of Belarus)
  • Comprehensive social benefits package, including:

o Health insurance covering all the best med centers for you and your family

o Sport expenses compensation

o Psychologist services compensation

o Professional and English trainings

o Team activities

o 100% paid sick leave and 25-day paid vacation
